tool_description: List of all countries and cities
title: City List

api_list.name: getCity
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://city-list.p.rapidapi.com/api/getCity/{iso}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-list.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: getCountryList
api_list.description: return list of all country include ISO code and ISO3 code and phonecode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://city-list.p.rapidapi.com/api/getCountryList"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "city-list.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
